title: All Together Now: Fridays with The Moth - Nina McConigley
description:
This week, Nina connects to her heritage through tradition. This episode of All Together Now is hosted by Aleeza Kazmi, a former Assistant Producer and alumna of the EDU program at The Moth. You can find the prompts for this week’s episode on our website, themoth.org.

Hosted by: Aleeza Kazmi

Storyteller: Nina McConigley
itunes:subtitle: This week, Nina connects to her heritage through tradition.
itunes:author: The Moth
